game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you must explore the forgotten ruins to find the lost artifact and return it to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a rare enchanted weapon

task.description: You must discover the entrance to the ruins hidden in the dense forest.
A powerful ancient guardian protects the artifact. You must defeat it to proceed.
